biotools.summary:
k-mer based motif discovery in ChIP-Seq data without peak calling.

NoPeak: Binding Motif Discovery from ChIP-Seq Data without Peak calling.

Binding motif discovery through Chromatin immunoprecipitation with high-throughput DNA sequencing (ChIP-Seq) data is an important tool for understanding regulatory processes.

The NoPeak Software uses the integration profile of k-mers based on mapped reads.
